Configuration.JobFolder: [path to where you place your powershell scripts\GenerateTimelapse]
Configuration.LogFolder: [path to where you place your powershell scripts\Logs]
Configuration.TimelapseFolder: [path to where your Netcam Studio files are stored\Timelapse]
Configuration.OutputFolder: [path to where you place your powershell scripts\Output]
Configuration.YouTubeUploadFolder: [path to where you place your powershell scripts\Powershell-YouTube-Upload]
Configuration.YouTubeUploadScript: [path to where you place your powershell scripts\Powershell-YouTube-Upload\YouTube.ps1]
